template_text: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please share the last 4 digits of the payment method and the transaction ID so we can verify and issue a refund if applicable.
Thanks for contacting us about a duplicate charge. We have initiated a review. Refunds are processed within 3–5 business days once verified.
Please confirm your registered email and we’ll send a secure link to update your account access details.
Kindly try resetting your password using the 'Forgot Password' link. If the issue persists, let us know your username and browser version.
Thanks for reporting this. Could you share steps to reproduce, a screenshot, and the exact timestamp? We'll investigate immediately.
We’ve escalated this to our engineering team. Meanwhile, try clearing cache and restarting the app.
Thank you for your feedback! We’ve shared it with the product team. Your inputs help us prioritize improvements.
